## Attribution

This project uses and extends code from:

**Flow Matching Guide and Code**  
Original repository from Meta AI / Facebook Research.

The original work is described in:

> Lipman, Y., Havasi, M., Holderrieth, P., Shaul, N., Le, M., Karrer, B., Chen, R. T. Q., Lopez-Paz, D., Ben-Hamu, H., & Gat, I. (2024). *Flow Matching Guide and Code*.  
> https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.06264

The code in the original repository is licensed under **CC BY-NC** (non-commercial use only).  
Please refer to `facebookresearch/flow_matching/blob/main/LICENSE` for the full license.
